examples: We walked through the clear night under a beamy moon.
A pair of beamy searchlights swung back and forth in front of the concert hall.

body_content.explanation: A beamy smile shows joy or happiness:
examples: "Guess what I found out today!" she said with a bright, beamy smile.
Everyone at the table was looking at me with a beamy grin, waiting for me to open the envelope.

body_content.explanation: A beamy roof or building has beams (= long thick pieces of wood that support the roof) that are not hidden:
examples: The villa had beautiful terracotta floors and beamy ceilings.

body_content.explanation: A beamy boat is very wide:
examples: The small craft had to move to the side to make way for the beamy vessel.
This ship has a beamier hull than the one on which he had been stationed before.
